BriefDescription: Floating Point Operations Completed. Includes any type. It counts once for each 1, 2, 4 or 8 flop instruction. Use PM_1|2|4|8_FLOP_CMPL events to count flops.
One floating point instruction completed (fadd, fmul, fsub, fcmp, fsel, fabs, fnabs, fres, fsqrte, fneg).
Four floating point instruction completed (fadd, fmul, fsub, fcmp, fsel, fabs, fnabs, fres, fsqrte, fneg).
Two floating point instruction completed (FMA class of instructions: fmadd, fnmadd, fmsub, fnmsub). Scalar instructions only.
Single Precision floating point instruction completed.
Double Precision vector version of fmul, fsub, fcmp, fsel, fabs, fnabs, fres, fsqrte, fneg completed.
Four Double Precision vector instruction completed.
